title: Devin Review AI - Code Review Time Reduction
description: Devin released Devin Review on January 21, 2026, an AI-powered code review interface that groups changes logically, detects copied code and bugs, and reduces PR review time by 50%. Available for free during early release period.

community_feedback.quote: Reviews were great, it actually left meaningful comments, not high level nonsense
Code is getting faster. Review is the new bottleneck. We're fixing that with Devin Review. If you thought 2025 was crazy, get ready. 2026 is...

title: JetBrains Plugin Updates
description: Windsurf released multiple JetBrains plugin updates in January 2026, including version 2.12.5 on January 24 with bug fixes and performance improvements for large codebases.

title: Version 2.1.12 - Message Rendering Bug Fix
description: Claude Code released v2.1.12 on January 17, 2026, fixing a message rendering bug. This follows multiple January releases including v2.1.11 (MCP connection fixes), v2.1.9 (auto:N syntax for MCP tool search, plansDirectory setting, external editor support), and v2.1.7 (showTurnDuration setting, inline task notifications, security fixes).

title: Version 0.87.0 - User Message Metadata
description: Codex CLI released version 0.87.0 on January 16, 2026, with user message metadata (text elements and byte ranges) now round-tripping through protocol/app-server/core for improved UI functionality.

title: Subagents, Skills, and Image Generation
description: Cursor released major updates introducing Subagents (independent parallel agents with custom prompts and tool access), Agent Skills (discoverable workflows via SKILL.md files), and Image Generation capabilities using Google Nano Banana Pro model. Also added Cursor Blame for Enterprise to track AI vs human-written code attribution.

title: Cursor CLI with Agent Modes and Cloud Handoff
description: Cursor CLI released with Plan and Ask modes, cloud handoff for background tasks, one-click MCP authentication, word-level inline diffs, and model management commands. Brings many editor features to the command line interface.

title: Cowork Desktop Preview - Major AI Innovation
description: Anthropic introduced Claude Cowork as a desktop preview for macOS on January 12, 2026. This feature brings Code's agentic capabilities to knowledge work with local VM access, described as potentially one of the biggest AI innovations of 2026.

community_feedback.quote: Well positioned to bring the wildly powerful capabilities of Claude Code to a wider audience
After installing Claude Cowork, within 2 hours it had produced 14 job descriptions they'd been 'getting to' since November
Claude Cowork looks amazingâ€”do you think this could cause many startups to fail?

title: Security Update - Code Integrity Layer
description: Windsurf released a 'Secure-by-Default' update on January 12, 2026, introducing a new Code Integrity layer integration to ensure code security and integrity features across the platform.

title: Infosys Strategic Partnership Announcement
description: Infosys and Cognition announced strategic collaboration on January 7, 2026. After six months of using Devin, Infosys reported significant improvements in engineering quality and efficiency.
